      • addSimplePartition

        public Partition addSimplePartition(String name,
                                    String[] domainComponents)
                             throws NamingException
        Description copied from interface: ApacheDs
        Creates a partition usable for testing and other light usage.
        Specified by:
        addSimplePartition in interface ApacheDs
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the partition. Will be used as the directory name when persisted.
        domainComponents - E.g. "plexus", "codehaus", "org"
        Throws:
        NamingException
